column2: Gehenna Prophecy

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] announces a dire prophecy to your court:

"And the Dark Mother
herself will be brought forth
and there, in the valley of Enoch, will there be a battle
a duel of Dark Father and Dark Mother
The Demon Queen will bite deep
The Damned King will bite deeper"

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] marks the signs of Gehenna:

"Mark the
shadow which
flies
mark the dragon
which rises
mark the darkness
which moves
mark the shadow of the
moon"

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] falls into a trance muttering,

"You will know these times, for a black
hand will rise up and choke all those
who oppose it
and those who eat heart's blood will
flourish
and the Kindred will crowd each to
his own, and vitae will be as rare as
diamonds"

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] has a revelation:

"There will come a time,
when the heads of three Princes
will watch the burning of the dawn
on a pillar of white"

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] has a prophetic warning:

"And you will know these last times
by the Time of Thin Blood,
which will mark vampires that
cannot Beget,
you will know them by the Clanless,
who will come to rule"

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] reveals that hope will come from the kine:

"the last Daughter of Eve,
and in her there will be decided the fate of all.
And you will not know this woman, except by the
mark of the Moon on her,
and she will face treachery, hatred, and pain
but in her is the last hope."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] warns of the coming of the devouring mother:

"There will come a time
when an ancient hunger will awaken
deep in the northern woods
and consume all her childer."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] prophesizes subterranean threat:

"There will come a time
when an Elder Darkness will stir
deep below a city which has forgotten
and will surprise the Elder, its children."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] warns of the end times:

"On these signs, you must know,
that Gehenna waits, even at the door,
as an actor waits in the wings
It is coming! It is near!

Shine black the sun!
Shine blood the moon!
Gehenna is coming soon"

Falling into a trance, [gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] babbles:

'Quiet! Hear the raven's cry!
The stillness of the wind
rising hot on the street
the towers hide
the darkness of the day
When Lasombra's dreams-come true
on the day when the moon runs as blood
and the sun rises black in the sky,
that is the day of the Damned, when Caine's children will rise again."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] looks to the ground and then to the sky:

"And the world will turn cold
and unclean things will boil up from the ground
and great storms will roll, lighting will light
fires, animals will fester and their bodies,
twisted, will fall.
So, too, our Grandsires will rise
from the ground
They will break their fast on the
first part of us
They will consume us whole"

Muttering in tongues, [gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName]'s words suddenly gain clarity:

"We will not know the thing which will happen,
but the sky will tear apart, and the earth below
And the forces of Hell will pour up out of the ground
On the Third Day, there will be silence
the crows will feed on the carrion
plague will dance amongst the ruins
the last of the Wild Ones will leave this place
the last of the Moon-Beasts will fight
and fall"

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] falls into a trance and mutters:

"And the Antediluvians will make for themselves
an Empire of Blood
They will rule with iron talons
They will wrench the hearts of all still alive
And the full sum of the earth's living will come
and live in the Last City, called Gehenna."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] foretells:

"And there will be a reign of one thousand years,
and there will be no love, or life, or pity,
the mighty will be as slaves
the virtuous will be made foul
every good gift, and every perfect gift will be tainted
by the Father of Darkness, whose power will come from
the nether realms."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] portends:

"Thou shall not become as a God to the Children of Seth.
for the One Above, growing jealous in his sky,
will strike down the line of Caine forever.
Remember gentle-faced Ashtareth,
Remember golden-fat Baal.
Remember strong Tammauz,
Know thou that the Children of Seth will rise up
with weapons from the One Above,
and conquer us, should we be as Gods to them."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] prognosticates:

"They will serve us while the Sun rides the sky,
and watch over our houses, with quenching water,
against Michael`s Fire.
They will feed us. and provide us with clothes,
They will dance for us, and provide us with song,
They will lay with us, and provide us with comfort.
They will advise us, and we will listen to their advice.
They will worship us, and we must not allow their worship."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] prophesizes:

"And from those whose blood is Water!
The cities of the West will blaze with rage,
And a great wheel from the East,
From the formless lands,
Will crush them!
On the last night
When the moon is a silver of darkness
Comes the final embrace!
Shine black the sun!
Shine black the moon!
The waters rise!"

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] predicts:

"See the colossus of steel astride the world
Behold the worms in his feet.
As the giant totters, the worms rejoice,
For there will be food aplenty when the giant falls."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] foretells:

"Hear the howls in the night
As the wolves of Adam
Cast themselves into the Dragon's coils.
Smell the brother's blood from time's beginning"

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] portends:

"See the broken chamber of 500 years
And the shattered crystal upon the floor.
See the stones weeping and the dragons free.
Lilith is here.
Lilith is free."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] declares:

"Five hundred years will seven be joined
Ruling in defiance of angels
Seeking unity among the damned.
Beware the Cainite who so forgets his curse
As to dream of mortal harmony."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] advises:

"Hearken to the prophet's words of blood-filled dreams and shortened nights.
Of hunger risen to claim its own, of arrogance turned to ash.
Hearken to the words of the seer, whose vision rends the veil of time
And to the warrior of lost nights, whose sword cries out for vengeance.
Hearken to the word of the scholar, for whom knowledge is a curse."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] warns:

"Ancient horrors are but dreams of things to come.
From them shall come warning.
From them shall come wisdom
From them shall come slaughter."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] prophesizes:

"Within the get of Caine there is a hunger stirring.
Once, twice, thrice the call to the power and death
Will rend the souls of the Thirteen.
This is the death without bloodshed,
This is the grave that has no ghosts."

[gehenna_seer.GetTitledFirstName] portends:

"Behold, one dies in silence, cries unheard.
Children will bear his name but not his blood.
Blissful in ignorance, savoring blindness,
His get live out the minutes one by one,
While those who savor secret knoweledge tremble,
Scouring the world for each last drop of truth.
There is no salvation in killing.\Nor do the damned ever forget."
Accept the prophecy!
Reject the prophecy!
